el:protected.el:luamain:
-- GENERAL -- levelw = 20 levelh = 13 enigma.ConserveLevel=TRUE
-- LANDSCAPE -- create_world(levelw, levelh) draw_border("st-likeoxydc") fill_floor("fl-space",0,0, level_width,level_height)
-- FLOORS -- fill_floor("fl-white",16,2,2,2) fill_floor("fl-white",15,8,2,2) fill_floor("fl-white",11,3,2,2) fill_floor("fl-white",10,7,2,2) fill_floor("fl-white",7,2,2,2) fill_floor("fl-white",6,6,2,2) fill_floor("fl-white",2,9,2,2) fill_floor("fl-white",2,2,2,2)
-- STONES -- set_stone("st-likeoxydc",6,6) set_stone("st-likeoxydc",7,7)
-- OXYDS -- oxyd_default_flavor = "c"
oxyd(16,2) oxyd(17,3) oxyd(15,8) oxyd(16,9) oxyd(12,3) oxyd(11,4) oxyd(10,7) oxyd(11,8) oxyd(8,3) oxyd(7,2) oxyd(6,7) oxyd(7,6) oxyd(2,9) oxyd(3,10) oxyd(3,3) oxyd(2,2)
oxyd_shuffle()
-- ACTOR -- set_actor("ac-blackball",17.5,2.5)
